item.title: Richard Powers, Orfeo
item.description: “The mind may give up its desire to improve on creation and function as a faithful receiver of experience.” John Cage

item.title: Richard Powers, The Overstory
item.description: “The Overstory” by Richard Powers piqued my interest among the novelsÂ shortlisted for the Booker Prize. And once again the book that interested me most did not win. One year I will succeed in my prediction!
